title: Better Play - Montessori Inspired Play Space
blurb: Montessori-inspired space for kids aged 6 months to 6 years.
description: Discover a Montessori-inspired play space offering high-quality toys and classes designed to promote focused engagement and learning for children aged six months to six years. Created by parents, this safe and calm environment allows children to relax, explore, and play together. Enjoy a variety of activities suitable for young children, including music classes and free play sessions. Perfect for families looking for a stimulating and educational playtime experience. Socks are required for both adults and children. Join us for a fun and enriching experience!
datetime_display: Mon to Fri | 9:30am to 5pm Sat to Sun | 9:30am to 6pm
full_address: 451 Joo Chiat Road #02-12 Katong Point, Singapore 427664 (above Little Farms)

title: Better Play - Indoor Playground and Party Venue
blurb: Come play! Playtime with us is for 2 hours.
description: Better Play is an indoor playground and party venue. We offer a safe and fun environment for children to play and explore. Our playground features a variety of play equipment, including slides, climbing structures, and a ball pit. We also have a dedicated party room for birthday parties and other special events. We host private parties over the weekends â€“ check out our Instagram post for closure updates or WhatsApp us! Playtime with us is for 2 hours, so be sure to arrive at least 2 hours before closing.
datetime_display: Playtime with us is for 2 hours
full_address: 451 Joo Chiat Road #02-12 Katong Point, Singapore 427664 (above Little Farms)

title: Betterplay Singapore Classes and Activities
blurb: Explore diverse classes and activities for kids.
description: Betterplay Singapore offers a variety of classes and activities designed to engage and entertain children of all ages. From creative arts and music to sports and educational workshops, there's something for every child to discover and enjoy. Our programs are designed to foster creativity, build confidence, and develop essential skills in a fun and supportive environment. We cater to a wide range of interests and age groups, ensuring that each child finds an activity that sparks their passion and helps them grow. Join us for enriching experiences that will inspire your child's love of learning and play.
full_address: 451 Joo Chiat Road #02-12 Katong Point, Singapore 427664 (above Little Farms)

title: Better Play Indoor Playgrounds and Activities
blurb: Indoor playgrounds and activities for families.
description: Better Play Singapore offers a variety of indoor playgrounds and activities suitable for families with children of various ages. Located at Katong Point, above Little Farms, the venue provides a safe and engaging environment for kids to explore and play. Contact us via WhatsApp at +65 8749 2167 for more information on available activities and pricing. Follow us on Instagram @betterplaysingapore for updates and promotions. We focus on providing quality play experiences for families.
full_address: Address: 451 Joo Chiat Road #02-12 Katong Point, Singapore 427664 (above Little Farms
